sentences.en: A downfall is expected, so take an umbrella.
sentences.cn: 估计要下大雨, 把伞带上.

sentences.en: A long - lost brother, who was presumed dead, was really alive all the time and wickedly plotting to bring about the hero's downfall.
sentences.cn: 一位失踪很久的兄弟, 人们以为他死了, 其实一直活着,而且在居心叵测地密谋搞垮主人公.

sentences.en: He had a fall, which was ominous of his downfall.
sentences.cn: 他曾跌倒, 这是他垮台的征兆.

sentences.en: Her sharp, aggressive tone set in motion the events that led to her downfall.
sentences.cn: 她那咄咄逼人的尖锐语调拉开了导致她垮台的事件的序幕。

sentences.en: His honesty had been his downfall.
His lack of experience had led to his downfall.
sentences.cn: 经验不足导致了他的下台。

sentences.en: His pride may still be his downfall.
sentences.cn: 他的傲慢可能还会毁了他。

sentences.en: Mr. McBryde was shocked at his downfall.
sentences.cn: 麦伯莱德先生看他这样不硬气,感到很震惊.

sentences.en: The downfall of Germany seemed to him inexplicable by ordinary processes.
sentences.cn: 德国的失败,在他看来,按通常的事理是难以理解的.

sentences.en: The enemies are scheming her downfall.
sentences.cn: 敌人正在策划使她垮台.

sentences.en: the scandal that led to the president’s downfall
The sex scandal finally led to his downfall.
sentences.cn: 这桩绯闻最终使他身败名裂。

sentences.en: The surrender knelled the downfall of the tyrant.
sentences.cn: 投降宣告了暴君的垮台.

sentences.en: Various factors contributed to his downfall.
sentences.cn: 多种因素导致了他的垮台.
这是不是我最后的堕落 呢 ?

trans.tran_cn: （雨等的）大下特下，（家，国等的）没落，垮台
trans.tran_en: complete loss of your money, moral standards, social position etc, or the sudden failure of an organization
